CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 27, 1945, pg. 24, reads: "Overseas - T/5 Raymond P. Drawn, pictured with his mother, Mrs. O. M. Drawn, 2333 Centre Avenue, and his younger brother, Novel Lee, while home on a 10-day furlough. He was stationed at Fort Sill, Oklahoma, and is now overseas. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Novel Lee in front, Mrs. O. M. Drawn, and Raymond P. Drawn wearing U. S. Army uniform, posed in Harris Studio
